attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rethink the pay cuts to the soldiers of today and tommorow.
 These cuts are a complete disaster to the defence of the United Kingdom.Pay cuts not only deter the recruiting of soldiers to the regular army , but also deter the men and women of the territorials who give support to the regulars.The cadet training intructors  are the people who train forthcoming soldiers of the future.Lets not put at risk our country that our fathers and past relatives died for in the past. We need to recruit and train the right kind of people who will turn out to be the soldiers of tomorrow, who we need badly.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
